price: 13. Usuk tuxxiqik tukkalot как xayuk Raaqam yaqbude Yallak kalah, usuk Yallak kalah yaqbudeh yanim manxu uma cateynaay manxu uma kataysaay.
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقۡرَبُ مِن نَّفۡعِهِۦۚ لَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡعَشِيرُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min nafʿihi labi'sa al-mawlā walabi'sa al-ʿashīru
